author: Staff Reporter
text:
Fine collected for traffic violations

A sum of Rs. 3.82 lakh was collected as fine from motorists for traffic violations on on January 16 and 17.

During vehicle checks, 340 motorists were booked for drunken driving, 3,718 for not wearing helmet.

A total of 305 motorists were found violating various road rules. Hence, a total of 4,563 cases were registered for violations in two days. Superintendent of Police S.R. Senthil Kumar said that surprise checks and intensified patrolling prevented accidents during these days.
title: Rs. 3.82 lakh fine collected for traffic violations
